      • calculerRestoMidi

        public void calculerRestoMidi(int today,
                              int nbjour,
                              int startNoeudMidi,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> mapArriverMidi,
                              java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> listResultatRoute,
                              int listArcSize,
                              int nbNoeud,
                              double distance_max,
                              double distance_min)
        Calculate feasible lunch restaurant nodes, and add these nodes with their departure again time in Map Arriver Midi
        Parameters:
        today - The day number of today
        nbjour - The day number of whole travel
        startNoeudMidi - The start node this morning
        mapArriverMidi - The feasible lunch restaurant nodes with their departure again time
        listResultatRoute - A list of temporary results connected within all feasible node paths for whole travel
        listArcSize - The size of all the edges
        nbNoeud - The total number of nodes
        distance_max - The maximum distance
        distance_min - The minimum distance

      • calculerRestoSoir

        public void calculerRestoSoir(int today,
                              int nbjour,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> mapArriverMidi,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> mapArriverSoir,
                              java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> listResultatRoute,
                              int listArcSize,
                              int nbNoeud,
                              double distance_max,
                              double distance_min,
                              java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> listNoeudArriverSoir)
        Calculate feasible diner restaurant nodes, and add these nodes with their departure again time in Map Arriver Soir
        Parameters:
        today - The day number of today
        nbjour - The day number of whole travel
        mapArriverMidi - The feasible lunch restaurant nodes with their departure again time
        mapArriverSoir - The feasible diner restaurant nodes with their departure again time
        listResultatRoute - A list of temporary results connected within all feasible node paths for whole travel
        listArcSize - The size of all the edges
        nbNoeud - The total number of nodes
        distance_max - The maximum distance
        distance_min - The minimum distance
        listNoeudArriverSoir - A list of temporary feasible nodes every afternoon, each node can be arriver only one time every afternoon

        public void calculerHotelNuit(int today,

                              java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> mapArriverMidi,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> mapArriverSoir,

                              double distance_min,
                              java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> listNoeudArriverNuit)
        Calculate feasible hotel nodes, and add these nodes with their arrive time in Map Arriver Nuit
        Parameters:
        today - The day number of today
        nbjour - The day number of whole travel
        mapArriverMidi - The feasible lunch restaurant nodes with their arrive time
        mapArriverSoir - The feasible diner restaurant nodes with their arrive time
        mapArriverNuit - The feasible hotel nodes with their arrive time
        listResultatRoute - A list of temporary results connected within all feasible node paths for whole travel
        listArcSize - The size of all the edges
        nbNoeud - The total number of nodes
        distance_max - The maximum distance
        distance_min - The minimum distance
        listNoeudArriverNuit - A list of temporary feasible nodes every night, each node can be arriver only one time every night
